content.description: Fun traverse with a bunch of jugs and pinches! Crux is the transition into the horizontal crack in the middle of the flake!
content.location: Second boulder to the left walking into the Hallway. the climb is on the edge and middle of the flake on the thunderstorm boulder.

content.description: Start with right hand in the lightning strike crack and left hand on the gaston. Crux is the second and third move on crimps in the middle of the bolder.
content.location: Second boulder to the left as you walk into the hallway, looks like a storm cloud with the crack at the base being the lightning strike.

content.description: Sit start with hands on the 2 slope nubs on the lower rock, drop knee and send for the chip!!!   reaching for the chip is the crux! Then continue up the right hand side of the Boulder to top out. Watch out for chossy rock as this area is new and still being developed for bouldering.
content.location: Right hand side of the thunderstorm boulder, start with hands on the right side of the lower right boulder

content.description: Gaston your way up! Crux is all mental, with thin feet on the face. Top out to end the route.  Keep feet on the face to snag the grade
content.location: Go ten feet past the tree in the hallway, its to the left there, tallest route vertically in the hallway

content.description: Around 4 boulders live here. Send some routes!
